Actions.Name: Add a row into a table [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Add a row into a table instead.
Add a new row into the Excel table.

Actions.Name: Add a row into a table
Actions.Description: Add a new row into the Excel table.

Actions.Name: Add a key column to a table
Actions.Description: Add a key column to an Excel table. The new column will be appended to the right.

Actions.Name: Create table
Actions.Description: Create a new table in the Excel workbook.

Actions.Name: Create worksheet
Actions.Description: Create a new worksheet in the Excel workbook.

Actions.Name: Delete a row
Actions.Description: Delete a row using a key column.

Actions.Name: Get worksheets
Actions.Description: Get a list of worksheets in the Excel workbook.

Actions.Name: Get a row
Actions.Description: Get a row using a key column.

Actions.Name: List rows present in a table
Actions.Description: List rows present in a table.

Actions.Name: Get tables
Actions.Description: Get a list of tables in the Excel workbook.

Actions.Name: For a selected row
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow for a selected row in an Excel table. (Available only for Power Automate.)

Actions.Name: Update a row
Actions.Description: Update a row using a key column. The input value will overwrite the specified cells and columns left blank will not be updated. In order to append (instead of overwrite) a value, use the "Get a row" action to retrieve the content first.

Actions.Name: Run script
Actions.Description: Runs an Office Script against an Excel workbook.
